greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1 - x^2)^4 / ((1 - x)^4 * (1 - x^4)) in powers of x.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,-1,1).
formula: a(n) = 4 * b(n) unless n=0 and b(n) is multiplicative with b(2) = 3/2, b(2^e) = 1/2 if e>1, b(p^e) = 1 if p>2.
a(n) = a(-n) for all n in Z. a(n+4) = a(n) unless n=0 or n=-4. a(2*n + 1) = 4. a(4*n) = 2 unless n=0. a(4*n + 2) = 6.
a(n) = 2 * A068073(n) unless n=0. - _Michael Somos_, Apr 17 2015
mathematica: a[ n_] := -Boole[n == 0] + 4 - If[ EvenQ[n], (-1)^(n/2) 2, 0]; (* _Michael Somos_, Apr 17 2015 *)
a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ -1 + 4/(1 - x) - 2/(1 + x^2), {x, 0, Abs@n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Jan 07 2019 *)
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Aug 13 2009
